decisions.description: If this case is a New Hire Enrollment Case send CSAT Email alert with Qualtrics survey link.
decisions.name: Send_BYB_Email_Alert_With_Onboarding_Close_Date
decisions.label: Send BYB Email Alert With Onboarding Close Date

rules.name: BYB_Case_CES_CSAT_survey_on_Onboarding_Close_Date
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7
rules.label: BYB Case CES/CSAT survey on Onboarding Close Date

decisions.description: If this case is a New Hire Enrollment Case send CSAT Email alert with Qualtrics survey link.
decisions.name: What_type_of_Survey_Email_Alert_0
decisions.label: What type of Survey Email Alert

rules.name: Modern_Bank_And_GEP_Qualtrics_Survey
rules.conditionLogic: ( 1 OR 12) AND (5 OR 13) AND (2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 10) AND 11 AND 14
rules.label: Modern Bank and GEP Qualtrics Survey

decisions.name: What_type_of_Survey_Email_Alert_2
decisions.label: What type of Survey Email Alert 2

Flow.description: All Case case Qualtrics Email Alerts are triggered through this flow. -Updated related BO when closing the case (BYB) - BBO-1827 - added qualtrics survey for client relations - BTE-3951 - send survey after 24 hours for engagement and client relation RT
Flow.label: Case Qualtrics Survey Trigger

recordCreates.description: Create Exception Log when Email Alert Fails
recordCreates.name: Exception_Log
recordCreates.label: Exception Log

recordUpdates.description: Set case Survey_Sent__c to true and Close the Case
recordUpdates.name: Survey_Sent_is_True_and_Close_Case
recordUpdates.label: Survey Sent is True and Close Case

recordUpdates.name: Update_Order_Status_Detail_in_BO
recordUpdates.label: Update Order Status Detail in BO

start.filterLogic: (1 AND 2) AND ((3 AND 4 AND 5) OR (6 AND 7) OR (20 AND 7) OR (8 AND 7 AND 9 AND 10) OR (11 AND 7) OR (12 AND 7) OR (13 AND 4 AND 9) OR (14 AND 7) OR (15 AND 4 AND 5) OR (16 AND 4 AND 7 AND 23 AND 10 AND 17) OR (18 AND 4 AND 7 AND 23 AND 10 AND 17) OR (19 AND 4 AND 7 AND 9 AND 10 AND 17) OR (24 AND 4 AND 7 AND 23 AND 10 AND 17) OR (4 AND 7 AND 9 AND 10 AND 17 AND 21) OR (4 AND 7 AND 9 AND 10 AND 17 AND 22) OR (25 AND 23))

textTemplates.description: Flow interview Error Alert sent to BizTech shared email biztech-dev@gusto.com
textTemplates.name: SurveyEmailAlertFailed
